# probounds.create_probounds_crosstab { #probounds.probounds.create_probounds_crosstab }

```python
probounds.create_probounds_crosstab(raw_data, datatype)
```

Generate a normalized probability bounds crosstab.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name     | Type                                  | Description                                                                                                                                                                               | Default           |
|----------|---------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------|
| raw_data | FrameLike                             | Observational or experimental data containing ``trt`` and ``outcome`` columns.                                                                                                            | _required_        |
| datatype | (\'observational\', \'experimental\') | The type of study represented by ``raw_data``. Observational data are normalized against the total number of records, while experimental data are normalized within each treatment group. | `"observational"` |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type             | Description                                                                   |
|--------|------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|        | polars.DataFrame | Crosstab with normalized outcome probabilities and an ``All`` summary column. |

## Raises {.doc-section .doc-section-raises}

| Name   | Type       | Description                                                                                  |
|--------|------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|        | ValueError | Raised when ``datatype`` is not supported or when ``raw_data`` does not contain any records. |
